Articles.Content:
I'm not certain, but it juts randomly came into my head that the triggers (left trigger and right trigger) are unused in this game. With all the controls they had to map surely they could have used them for something? Zoom maybe?

Also, in the map mode, having target switching on left bumper and right bumper is KILLING ME. The bumper buttons are so heavily utilized that I end up accidentally triggering these at least once per mission.
IIRC, the triggers control roll in flight mode. Yeah, I spend a lot of time looking at Kerbol or Eeloo.
